answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
Sounds like quite an opportunity for capturing methane gases for alternate fuel usage.  Bring in some gas specialists to see how you can control, capture and market the gas..

answers.author: Chris Kukulski
answers.text:
Methane is already being captured and pulled off.  I'm referring to over 30 VOCs that are in the soil gas and are causing health concerns for neighboring homeowners

author: Chris Kukulski
text: I'm looking for fellow city managers who have dealt with indoor air quality problems associated with soil gas vapors that are believed to be coming from our municipal landfill.  If you would provide your contact info, I would appreciate your advice.
title: Soil Gas tied to municipal landfill
